name: Message Notifications
description: Sends a notification when you received a new message

issues.info: Report issues on the GitHub repo

check-interval.name: Check Messages (Seconds)
check-interval.description:
How often to check for messages
Note: Setting the value too low can get you temporarily IP banned

60 Seconds = 1 Minute
120 Seconds = 2 Minutes
180 Seconds = 3 Minutes
240 Seconds = 4 Minutes
300 Seconds = 5 Minutes
360 Seconds = 6 Minutes
420 Seconds = 7 Minutes
480 Seconds = 8 Minutes
540 Seconds = 9 Minutes
600 Seconds = 10 Minutes
3600 Seconds = 1 Hour

disable-while-editing.name: Disable While Editing
disable-while-editing.description: Don't check for messages while in the editor

disable-while-playing.name: Disable While Playing
disable-while-playing.description: Don't check for messages while playing levels
